queries.GET_DETAILS: SELECT a.id, a.user_name, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role) as roles, u.grp_id  FROM authentication as a INNER JOIN user_roles as r ON (a.id = r.user_id) INNER JOIN users as u ON (u.user_id = a.id) WHERE user_name = %s GROUP BY a.id, a.user_name, u.grp_id
queries.GET_MENU: select i.items, m.date, m.id from menu as m inner join items as i on m.id = i.menu_id where m.status = %s and m.grp_id = %s
queries.GET_ACCEPTED_MENU: select i.items, m.date, m.id from `groups` as g inner join approved_menu as a on g.menu_id = a.id inner join menu as m on a.menu_id = m.id inner join items as i on m.id = i.menu_id where g.id = %s
queries.GET_USERS: select user_id, balance from user_balance where grp_id=%s
queries.ACCEPT_MENU: update menu set status = 5 where id = %s
queries.REJECT_MENU: update menu set status = 3 where id = %s
queries.GET_HASHED_PASSWORD: SELECT password from authentication where user_name = %s
queries.GET_MENU_FDB_CRITERIAS: select distinct g.menu_id,r.id,r.criteria from `groups` as g inner join menu_fdb_criterias as f on g.menu_id = f.menu_id inner join fdb_criterias as r on f.cr_id = r.id where g.id = %s
queries.ADD_FEEDBACK: INSERT into `menu_fdb`(user_id, cr_id, menu_id, feedback, comments) values(%s,%s,%s,%s,%s)
queries.VIEW_FEEDBACK: select c.criteria, f.feedback, f.comments from `groups` as g inner join menu_fdb as f on f.menu_id = g.menu_id inner join fdb_criterias as c on f.cr_id = c.id where g.id = %s;
queries.UPDATE_BALANCE_GROUP: UPDATE user_balance set balance=balance+%s where grp_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_BALANCE_USER: UPDATE user_balance set balance=balance+%s where user_id = %s
queries.VIEW_BALANCE: Select balance from user_balance where user_id = %s
queries.VALIDATE_USER: select * from user_balance where user_id=%s and grp_id=%s
queries.STORE_ORDER: insert into orders(user_id, amount, created_by) values(%s,%s,%s)
queries.CHECK_MENU_STATUS: select id from menu where `status` = %s and grp_id = %s
queries.CHECK_REJECTED_MENU: select m.id, c.comments from menu as m inner join menu_comments as c on m.id = c.menu_id where m.`status` = 'rejected' and grp_id = %s
queries.DISCARD_MENU: update menu set status = 'discarded' where id = %s
queries.QUERY_MENU_STATUS: update menu set status = 'published' where id = %s
queries.QUERY_ADD_COMMENT: insert into menu_comments(menu_id, comments, created_by) values(%s,%s,%s)
queries.VIEW_MENU_BY_MENUID: select i.items, m.date from menu as m inner join items as i on m.id = i.menu_id where m.id = %s
queries.UPDATE_ITEM: update items set items = %s where items = %s and menu_id = %s
queries.CHECK_USER_FDB: select f.user_id from menu_fdb as f inner join `approved_menu` as m on m.id = f.menu_id inner join `groups` as g on g.menu_id = m.id where f.user_id = %s
queries.UPDATE_MENU_STATUS: update menu set status = %s where id = %s
queries.CHECK_ORDER: select id, user_id, amount, created_at from orders where user_id = %s order by created_at desc;
